step_data.thought: The dropdown for transportation mode is currently set to 'Car (OSRM)', and the user wants to change it. Previously, I incorrectly attempted to change it to 'Bicycle (OSRM)', but now I will select 'Foot (OSRM)' as an alternative option to fulfill the user's request.
